query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Billie Jean', revolutionize the music industry and influence future artists?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal techniques and emotional delivery contribute to her success as one of the best-selling female artists of all time?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to reinvent his musical style and persona impact the evolution of rock music and popular culture?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's theatrical performances and songwriting contribute to Queen's status as one of the most iconic rock bands in history?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's blend of pop and R&B, along with her vocal range, shaped her career and influenced contemporary music trends?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's music and activism promote reggae as a global genre and advocate for social change?
